# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/d3-drag`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for D3JS d3-drag module (https://github.com/d3/d3-drag/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped.git/tree/master/types/d3-drag

Additional Details
 * Last updated: Wed, 23 May 2018 23:09:39 GMT
 * Dependencies: d3-selection
 * Global values: none
